subject: PACS
title: Conflict Transformation and Peacebuilding
description: This course explores the theoretical and practical foundations of various approaches to working with conflict to advance positive goals such as social equity and reconciliation.  Attention will be given to a range of conflict resolution methods and practices (facilitation, negotiation, mediation, arbitration, adjudication) as well as to principles of restorative justice and dynamics of collective peacebuilding practice.
